document_data.name: Angus Blackstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Angus Blackstone''' was an earl who lived in the [[Moonshaes]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He kept a pack of [[moorhound]]s, one of whom was called [[Warlock (moorhound)|Warlock]].
document_data.Relations: Blackstone's son and heir, [[Currag Blackstone]], was killed in mysterious circumstances in [[1365 DR]].
